00043 static int verbose = 0; // 0=minimal output, 1=verbose output
00044 typedef votca::tools::vec myvec;
00045 
00046 struct Event
00047 {
00048     // Event() : dr(3) {}
00049     int destination;
00050     double rate;
00051     votca::tools::vec dr;
00052 };
00053 
00054 
00055 class Node
00056 {
00057     public:
00058         int id;
00059         int occupied;
00060         int injectable;
00061         double escaperate;
00062         double occupationtime;
00063         vector<Event> event;
00064     
00065         double EscapeRate();
00066         // double CurrentEscapeRate(Node node2);
00067         // void Jump(Node node2);
00068         void AddEvent(int seg2, double rate12, myvec dr);
00069         void InitEscapeRate();
00070 };
00071 
00072 
00073 void Node::AddEvent(int seg2, double rate12, myvec dr)
00074 {
00075     Event newEvent;
00076     newEvent.destination = seg2;
00077     newEvent.rate = rate12;
00078     newEvent.dr = dr;
00079     this->event.push_back(newEvent);
00080 }
00081 
00082 
00083 void Node::InitEscapeRate()
00084 {
00085     double newEscapeRate = 0;
00086     for(unsigned int i=0; i<this->event.size();i++)
00087     {
00088         newEscapeRate += this->event[i].rate;
00089     }
00090     this->escaperate = newEscapeRate;
00091     // cout << "Escape rate for segment " << this->id << " was set to " << newEscapeRate << endl;
00092 }
00093 
00094 
00095 double Node::EscapeRate()
00096 {
00097     return escaperate;
00098 }

00110 
00111 void progressbar(double fraction)
00112 {
00113     int totalbars = 50;
00114     std::cout << "\r";
00115     for(double bars=0; bars<double(totalbars); bars++)
00116     {
00117         if(bars<=fraction*double(totalbars))
00118         {
00119             std::cout << "|";
00120         }
00121         else
00122         {
00123             std::cout << "-";
00124         }
00125     }
00126     std::cout << "  " << int(fraction*1000)/10. <<" %   ";
00127     std::cout << std::flush;
00128     if(fraction*100 == 100)
00129     {
00130         std::cout << std::endl;
00131     }
00132 }

00134 
00135 int OMPinfo() 
00136 {
00137     int nthreads=1, tid=0, procs, inpar=0;
00138     printf("\n||\n|| openMP PARALLEL COMPUTATION STATUS:\n");
00139     #pragma omp parallel private(tid)
00140     {
00141         # ifdef _OPENMP
00142         tid = omp_get_thread_num();
00143         if (tid == 0) 
00144         {
00145             procs = omp_get_num_procs();
00146             nthreads = omp_get_num_threads();
00147             inpar = omp_in_parallel();
00148             printf("|| Number of processors = %d\n", procs);
00149             printf("|| Number of threads = %d\n", nthreads);
00150     
00151         }
00152         # endif
00153         if (tid == 0) 
00154         {
00155             printf("|| In parallel? = %d\n||\n", inpar);
00156         }
00157     }
00158     return nthreads;
00159 }

00194 void KMCMultiple::Initialize(const char *filename, Property *options )
00195 {
00196         if (options->exists("options.kmcmultiple.runtime")) {
00197             _runtime = options->get("options.kmcmultiple.runtime").as<double>();
00198         }
00199         else {
00200             throw runtime_error("Error in kmcmultiple: total run time is not provided");
00201         }
00202 
00203 //      if (options->exists("options.kmcmultiple.outputtime")) {
00204 //          _dt = options->get("options.kmcmultiple.outputtime").as<double>();
00205 //      }
00206 //      else {
00207 //          throw runtime_error("Error in kmcmultiple: output frequency is not provided");
00208 //        }
00209 
00210         if (options->exists("options.kmcmultiple.seed")) {
00211             _seed = options->get("options.kmcmultiple.seed").as<int>();
00212         }
00213         else {
00214             throw runtime_error("Error in kmcmultiple: seed is not provided");
00215         }
00216         
00217         if (options->exists("options.kmcmultiple.numberofcharges")) {
00218             _numberofcharges = options->get("options.kmcmultiple.numberofcharges").as<int>();
00219         }
00220         else {
00221             throw runtime_error("Error in kmcmultiple: number of charges is not provided");
00222         }
00223 
00224         if (options->exists("options.kmcmultiple.injection")) {
00225             _injection_name = options->get("options.kmcmultiple.injection").as<string>();
00226         }
00227         else {
00228             throw runtime_error("Error in kmcmultiple: injection pattern is not provided");
00229         }
00230 
00231         if (options->exists("options.kmcmultiple.allowparallel")) {
00232             _allowparallel = options->get("options.kmcmultiple.allowparallel").as<int>();
00233         }
00234         else {
00235             cout << "WARNING in kmcmultiple: You did not specify if parallel computation is allowed. It will be disabled." << endl;
00236             _allowparallel = 0;
00237         }
00238         if (options->exists("options.kmcmultiple.fieldX")) {
00239             _fieldX = options->get("options.kmcmultiple.fieldX").as<double>();
00240         }
00241         else {
00242             _fieldX = 0;
00243         }
00244         if (options->exists("options.kmcmultiple.fieldY")) {
00245             _fieldY = options->get("options.kmcmultiple.fieldY").as<double>();
00246         }
00247         else {
00248             _fieldY = 0;
00249         }
00250         if (options->exists("options.kmcmultiple.fieldZ")) {
00251             _fieldZ = options->get("options.kmcmultiple.fieldZ").as<double>();
00252         }
00253         else {
00254             _fieldZ = 0;
00255         }
00256 
00257         _filename = filename;
00258 
00259        //cout << _seed << endl;
00260        //srand(_seed);
00261        //votca::tools::Random::init(rand(), rand(), rand(), rand());
00262 }
00263 
00264 vector<Node*> KMCMultiple::LoadGraph()
00265 {
00266     string injectionpattern = "*";
00267     
00268     vector<Node*> node;
00269     
00270     // Load nodes
00271     votca::tools::Database db;
00272     db.Open( _filename );
00273     if(verbose >= 1) {cout << "LOADING GRAPH" << endl << "database file: " << _filename << endl; }
00274     votca::tools::Statement *stmt = db.Prepare("SELECT id-1, name FROM segments;");
00275 
00276     int i=0;
00277     while (stmt->Step() != SQLITE_DONE)
00278     {
00279         Node *newNode = new Node();
00280         node.push_back(newNode);
00281 
00282         int newid = stmt->Column<int>(0);
00283         string name = stmt->Column<string>(1);
00284         node[i]->id = newid;
00285         if (votca::tools::wildcmp(injectionpattern.c_str(), name.c_str()))
00286         {
00287             node[i]->injectable = 1;
00288         }
00289         else
00290         {
00291             node[i]->injectable = 0;
00292         }
00293         i++;
00294     }
00295     delete stmt;
00296     if(verbose >= 1) { cout << "segments: " << node.size() << endl; }
00297     
00298     // Load pairs and rates
00299     int numberofpairs = 0;
00300     stmt = db.Prepare("SELECT seg1-1 AS 'segment1', seg2-1 AS 'segment2', rate12e AS 'rate', drX, drY, drZ FROM pairs UNION SELECT seg2-1 AS 'segment1', seg1-1 AS 'segment2', rate21e AS 'rate', -drX AS 'drX', -drY AS 'drY', -drZ AS 'drZ' FROM pairs ORDER BY segment1;");
00301     while (stmt->Step() != SQLITE_DONE)
00302     {
00303         int seg1 = stmt->Column<int>(0);
00304         int seg2 = stmt->Column<int>(1);
00305         double rate12 = stmt->Column<double>(2);
00306         myvec dr = myvec(stmt->Column<double>(3), stmt->Column<double>(4), stmt->Column<double>(5));
00307         node[seg1]->AddEvent(seg2,rate12,dr);
00308         numberofpairs ++;
00309     }    
00310     delete stmt;
00311 
00312     if(verbose >= 1) { cout << "pairs: " << numberofpairs/2 << endl; }
00313     
00314     // Calculate initial escape rates
00315     for(unsigned int i=0; i<node.size(); i++)
00316     {
00317         node[i]->InitEscapeRate();
00318     }
00319     return node;
00320 }
00321 
00322 void ResetForbidden(vector<int> &forbiddenid)
00323 {
00324     forbiddenid.clear();
00325 }
00326 
00327 void AddForbidden(int id, vector<int> &forbiddenid)
00328 {
00329     forbiddenid.push_back(id);
00330 }
00331 
00332 int Forbidden(int id, vector<int> forbiddenlist)
00333 {
00334     // cout << "forbidden list has " << forbiddenlist.size() << " entries" << endl;
00335     int forbidden = 0;
00336     for (unsigned int i=0; i< forbiddenlist.size(); i++)
00337     {
00338         if(id == forbiddenlist[i])
00339         {
00340             forbidden = 1;
00341             // cout << "ID " << id << " has been found as element " << i << " (" << forbiddenlist[i]+1<< ") in the forbidden list." << endl;
00342             break;
00343         }
00344     }
00345     return forbidden;
00346 }
00347 
00348 int Surrounded(Node* node, vector<int> forbiddendests)
00349 {
00350     //if(node->event.size() == forbiddendests.size())
00351     //{
00352     //    return 1;
00353     //}
00354     //else
00355     //{
00356     //    return 0;
00357     //}
00358     int surrounded = 1;
00359     for(unsigned int i=0; i<node->event.size(); i++)
00360     {
00361         int thisevent_possible = 1;
00362         for(unsigned int j=0; j<forbiddendests.size(); j++)
00363         {
00364             if(node->event[i].destination == forbiddendests[j])
00365             {
00366                 thisevent_possible = 0;
00367                 break;
00368             }
00369         }
00370         if(thisevent_possible == 1)
00371         {
00372             surrounded = 0;
00373             // cout << "NOT SURROUNDED, POSSIBLE EVENT: " << node->id+1 << "->" << node->event[i].destination+1 << endl;
00374             break;
00375         }
00376     }
00377     return surrounded;
00378 }
00379 
00380 void printtime(int seconds_t)
00381 {
00382     int seconds = seconds_t;
00383     int minutes = 0;
00384     int hours = 0;
00385     while(seconds / 60 >= 1)
00386     {
00387         seconds -= 60;
00388         minutes +=  1;
00389     }
00390     while(minutes / 60 >= 1)
00391     {
00392         minutes -= 60;
00393         hours +=  1;
00394     }
00395     char buffer [50];
00396     int n = sprintf(buffer, "%d:%02d:%02d",hours,minutes,seconds);
00397     printf("%s",buffer,n);
00398 }
00399 
00400 vector<double> KMCMultiple::RunVSSM(vector<Node*> node, double runtime, unsigned int numberofcharges, votca::tools::Random2 *RandomVariable)
00401 {
00402     int tid = 0;
00403     # ifdef _OPENMP
00404     tid = omp_get_thread_num();
00405     # endif
00406 
00407     int realtime_start = time(NULL);
00408     if(tid == 0)
00409     {
00410         cout << endl << "Algorithm: VSSM for Multiple Charges" << endl;
00411         cout << "number of charges: " << numberofcharges << endl;
00412         cout << "number of nodes: " << node.size() << endl;
00413     }
00414     
00415     if(numberofcharges > node.size())
00416     {
00417         throw runtime_error("ERROR in kmcmultiple: specified number of charges is greater than the number of nodes. This conflicts with single occupation.");
00418     }
00419 
00420     double outputfrequency = runtime/100;
00421     vector<double> occP(node.size(),0.);
00422 
00423     // Injection
00424     vector< Chargecarrier* > carrier;
00425     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numberofcharges; i++)
00426     {
00427         Chargecarrier *newCharge = new Chargecarrier;      
00428         newCharge->id = i;
00429         newCharge->node = node[RandomVariable->rand_uniform_int(node.size())];
00430         while(newCharge->node->occupied == 1 || newCharge->node->injectable != 1)
00431         {   // maybe already occupied? or maybe not injectable?
00432             newCharge->node = node[RandomVariable->rand_uniform_int(node.size())];
00433         }
00434         newCharge->node->occupied = 1;
00435         newCharge->dr_travelled = myvec(0,0,0);
00436         if(tid == 0) {cout << "starting position for charge " << i+1 << ": segment " << newCharge->node->id+1 << endl; }
00437         carrier.push_back(newCharge);
00438     }    
00439 
00440     double simtime = 0.;
00441     int step = 0;
00442     double nextoutput = outputfrequency;
00443     
00444     progressbar(0.);
00445     vector<int> forbiddennodes;
00446     vector<int> forbiddendests;
00447     while(simtime < runtime)
00448     {
00449         double cumulated_rate = 0;
00450         for(unsigned int i=0; i<numberofcharges; i++)
00451         {
00452             cumulated_rate += carrier[i]->node->EscapeRate();
00453         }
00454         if(cumulated_rate == 0)
00455         {   // this should not happen: no possible jumps defined for a node
00456             throw runtime_error("ERROR in kmcmultiple: Incorrect rates in the database file. All the escape rates for the current setting are 0.");
00457         }
00458         // go forward in time
00459         double dt = 0;
00460         double rand_u = 1-RandomVariable->rand_uniform();
00461         while(rand_u == 0)
00462         {
00463             cout << "WARNING: encountered 0 as a random variable! New try." << endl;
00464             rand_u = 1-RandomVariable->rand_uniform();
00465         }
00466         dt = -1 / cumulated_rate * log(rand_u);
00467         simtime += dt;
00468         if(verbose >= 1 && tid == 0) {cout << "simtime += " << dt << endl << endl;}
00469         step += 1;
00470         
00471         for(unsigned int i=0; i<numberofcharges; i++)
00472         {
00473             carrier[i]->node->occupationtime += dt;
00474         }
00475 
00476         ResetForbidden(forbiddennodes);
00477         int level1step = 0;
00478         while(level1step == 0)
00479         // LEVEL 1
00480         {
00481             // determine which electron will escape
00482             Node* do_oldnode;
00483             Node* do_newnode;
00484             Chargecarrier* do_affectedcarrier;
00485             
00486             double u = 1 - RandomVariable->rand_uniform();
00487             for(unsigned int i=0; i<numberofcharges; i++)
00488             {
00489                 u -= carrier[i]->node->EscapeRate()/cumulated_rate;
00490                 if(u <= 0)
00491                 {
00492                     do_oldnode = carrier[i]->node;
00493                     do_affectedcarrier = carrier[i];
00494                     break;
00495                 }
00496                do_oldnode = carrier[i]->node;
00497                do_affectedcarrier = carrier[i];
00498             }
00499                 
00500             double maxprob = 0.;
00501             double newprob = 0.;
00502             myvec dr;
00503             if(verbose >= 1 && tid == 0) {cout << "Charge number " << do_affectedcarrier->id+1 << " which is sitting on segment " << do_oldnode->id+1 << " will escape!" << endl ;}
00504             if(Forbidden(do_oldnode->id, forbiddennodes) == 1) {continue;}
00505             
00506             // determine where it will jump to
00507             ResetForbidden(forbiddendests);
00508             while(true)
00509             {
00510             // LEVEL 2
00511                 if(verbose >= 1 && tid == 0) {cout << "There are " << do_oldnode->event.size() << " possible jumps for this charge:"; }
00512 
00513                 do_newnode = NULL;
00514                 u = 1 - RandomVariable->rand_uniform();
00515                 for(unsigned int j=0; j<do_oldnode->event.size(); j++)
00516                 {
00517                     if(Forbidden(do_oldnode->event[j].destination, forbiddendests) == 1)
00518                     {   // directly skip forbidden events
00519                         if(verbose >= 1 && tid == 0) { cout << " [" << do_oldnode->event[j].destination+1 << " FORBIDDEN]" ; }                         
00520                         continue;
00521                     }
00522                     if(verbose >= 1 && tid == 0) { cout << " " << do_oldnode->event[j].destination+1 ; }
00523                     u -= do_oldnode->event[j].rate/do_oldnode->EscapeRate();
00524                     if(u <= 0)
00525                     {
00526                         do_newnode = node[do_oldnode->event[j].destination];
00527                         dr = do_oldnode->event[j].dr;
00528                         break;
00529                     }
00530                     do_newnode = node[do_oldnode->event[j].destination];
00531                     dr = do_oldnode->event[j].dr;
00532                 }
00533 
00534                 if(do_newnode == NULL)
00535                 {
00536                     if(verbose >= 1 && tid == 0) {cout << endl << "Node " << do_oldnode->id+1  << " is SURROUNDED by forbidden destinations and zero rates. Adding it to the list of forbidden nodes. After that: selection of a new escape node." << endl; }
00537                     AddForbidden(do_oldnode->id, forbiddennodes);
00538                     int nothing=0;
00539                     cin >> nothing;
00540                     break; // select new escape node (ends level 2 but without setting level1step to 1)
00541                 }
00542                 if(verbose >= 1 && tid == 0) {cout << endl << "Selected jump: " << do_newnode->id+1 << endl; }
00543 
00544                 // if the new segment is unoccupied: jump; if not: nothing??
00545                 if(do_newnode->occupied == 1)
00546                 {
00547                     if(Surrounded(do_oldnode, forbiddendests) == 1)
00548                     {
00549                         if(verbose >= 1 && tid == 0) {cout << "Node " << do_oldnode->id+1  << " is SURROUNDED by forbidden destinations. Adding it to the list of forbidden nodes. After that: selection of a new escape node." << endl; }
00550                         AddForbidden(do_oldnode->id, forbiddennodes);
00551                         break; // select new escape node (ends level 2 but without setting level1step to 1)
00552                     }
00553                     if(verbose >= 1 && tid == 0) {cout << "Selected segment: " << do_newnode->id+1 << " is already OCCUPIED. Added to forbidden list." << endl << endl;}
00554                     AddForbidden(do_newnode->id, forbiddendests);
00555                     if(verbose >= 1 && tid == 0) {cout << "Now choosing different hopping destination." << endl; }
00556                     continue; // select new destination
00557                 }
00558                 else
00559                 {
00560                     do_newnode->occupied = 1;
00561                     do_oldnode->occupied = 0;
00562                     do_affectedcarrier->node = do_newnode;
00563                     do_affectedcarrier->dr_travelled += dr;
00564                     level1step = 1;
00565                     if(verbose >= 1 && tid == 0) {cout << "Charge has jumped to segment: " << do_newnode->id+1 << "." << endl;}
00566                     // cout << "old node: " << do_oldnode->id+1 << ", occupation: " << do_oldnode->occupied << endl;
00567                     // cout << "new node: " << do_newnode->id+1 << ", occupation: " << do_newnode->occupied << endl;
00568                     break; // this ends LEVEL 2 , so that the time is updated and the next MC step started
00569                 }
00570 
00571                 if(verbose >= 1 && tid == 0) {cout << "." << endl;}
00572             // END LEVEL 2
00573             }
00574         // END LEVEL 1
00575         }    
00576         
00577                
00578         if(simtime > nextoutput && tid == 0)
00579         {
00580             nextoutput = simtime + outputfrequency;
00581             progressbar(simtime/runtime);
00582             cout << " remaining: ";
00583             printtime(int((runtime/simtime-1) * (int(time(NULL)) - realtime_start))); 
00584         }
00585         // cout << "step " << step << endl;
00586     }
00587     progressbar(1.);
00588 
00589     
00590     // calculate occupation probabilities from occupation times    
00591     for(unsigned int j=0; j<node.size(); j++)
00592     {   
00593         occP[j] = node[j]->occupationtime / simtime;
00594     }
00595     
00596 
00597     if (tid == 0)
00598     {
00599         cout << endl << "finished KMC simulation after " << step << " steps." << endl;
00600         cout << "runtime: ";
00601         printtime(time(NULL) - realtime_start); 
00602         myvec dr_travelled = myvec (0,0,0);
00603         cout << endl << "Average velocities (m/s): " << endl;
00604         for(unsigned int i=0; i<numberofcharges; i++)
00605         {
00606             //cout << std::scientific << "    charge " << i+1 << ": " << carrier[i]->dr_travelled/simtime*1e-9 << endl;
00607             cout << std::scientific << "    charge " << i+1 << ": " << carrier[i]->dr_travelled/simtime << endl;
00608             dr_travelled += carrier[i]->dr_travelled;
00609         }
00610         dr_travelled /= numberofcharges;
00611         //cout << std::scientific << "  Overall average velocity (m/s): " << dr_travelled/simtime*1e-9 << endl;
00612         cout << std::scientific << "  Overall average velocity (m/s): " << dr_travelled/simtime << endl;
00613 
00614         cout << endl << "Distances travelled (m): " << endl;
00615         for(unsigned int i=0; i<numberofcharges; i++)
00616         {
00617             cout << std::scientific << "    charge " << i+1 << ": " << carrier[i]->dr_travelled << endl;
00618         }
00619         
00620         // calculate mobilities
00621         double absolute_field = sqrt(_fieldX*_fieldX + _fieldY*_fieldY + _fieldZ*_fieldZ);
00622         double average_mobilityZ = 0;
00623         if (absolute_field != 0)
00624         {
00625             cout << endl << "Mobilities (cm^2/Vs): " << endl;
00626             for(unsigned int i=0; i<numberofcharges; i++)
00627             {
00628                 //myvec velocity = carrier[i]->dr_travelled/simtime*1e-9;
00629                 myvec velocity = carrier[i]->dr_travelled/simtime;
00630                 double absolute_velocity = sqrt(velocity.x()*velocity.x() + velocity.y()*velocity.y() + velocity.z()*velocity.z());
00631                 //cout << std::scientific << "    charge " << i+1 << ": mu=" << absolute_velocity/absolute_field*1E4 << endl;
00632                 cout << std::scientific << "    charge " << i+1 << ": muZ=" << velocity.z()/_fieldZ*1E4 << endl;
00633                 average_mobilityZ += velocity.z()/_fieldZ*1E4;
00634             }
00635             average_mobilityZ /= numberofcharges;
00636             cout << std::scientific << "  Overall average z-mobility <muZ>=" << average_mobilityZ << endl;
00637         }
00638         cout << endl;
00639 
00640     
00641     }
00642     return occP;
00643 }
00644 
00645 
00646 void KMCMultiple::WriteOcc(vector<double> occP, vector<Node*> node)
00647 {
00648     votca::tools::Database db;
00649     cout << "Opening for writing " << _filename << endl;
00650         db.Open(_filename);
00651         db.Exec("BEGIN;");
00652         votca::tools::Statement *stmt = db.Prepare("UPDATE segments SET occPe = ? WHERE id = ?;");  // electron occ. prob., check (think about) this
00653         for(unsigned int i=0; i<node.size(); ++i)
00654         {
00655             stmt->Reset();
00656             stmt->Bind(1, occP[i]);
00657             stmt->Bind(2, node[i]->id+1);
00658             stmt->Step();
00659         }
00660         db.Exec("END;");
00661         delete stmt;
00662 }
00663 
00664 bool KMCMultiple::EvaluateFrame()
00665 {
00666     std::cout << "-----------------------------------" << std::endl;      
00667     std::cout << "      KMC FOR MULTIPLE CHARGES" << std::endl;
00668     std::cout << "-----------------------------------" << std::endl << std::endl;      
00669  
00670     unsigned int numberofthreads = 1;
00671     if(_allowparallel == 1)
00672     {
00673         numberofthreads = OMPinfo();
00674     }
00675     
00676     // Initialise random number generator
00677     // each thread i in a parallel computation needs is own set RandomVariable[i]
00678     if(verbose >= 1) { cout << endl << "Initialising random number generator" << endl; }
00679     srand(_seed); // srand expects any integer in order to initialise the random number generator
00680     vector< votca::tools::Random2* > RandomVariable;
00681     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numberofthreads; i++)
00682     {
00683         votca::tools::Random2 *newRandomVariable = new votca::tools::Random2();      
00684         RandomVariable.push_back(newRandomVariable);
00685         RandomVariable[i]->init(rand(), rand(), rand(), rand());
00686     }
00687     
00688     // VSSM KMC algorithm
00689     //cout << endl << "KMC SIMULATION" << endl;
00690     cout << "number of threads: " << numberofthreads << endl;
00691 
00692     vector<Node*> node;
00693     node = KMCMultiple::LoadGraph();
00694     vector<double> occP(node.size(),0.);
00695     vector< vector< double > > occPOneRun ( numberofthreads, vector<double> ( node.size(), 0. ) );
00696 
00697     # ifdef _OPENMP
00698     (void) omp_set_num_threads(numberofthreads);
00699     # endif
00700     #pragma omp parallel private(node)
00701     {
00702         node = KMCMultiple::LoadGraph();
00703         int thread = 0;
00704         # ifdef _OPENMP
00705         thread = omp_get_thread_num();
00706         # endif
00707         occPOneRun[thread] = KMCMultiple::RunVSSM(node, _runtime/numberofthreads, _numberofcharges, RandomVariable[thread]);
00708     }
00709 
00710     
00711     // get mean of multiple runs
00712     for(unsigned int j=0; j<occP.size();j++) 
00713     {
00714         for(unsigned int thread=0; thread<numberofthreads; thread++)
00715         {
00716             occP[j] += occPOneRun[thread][j];
00717         }
00718         occP[j] /= numberofthreads;
00719     }
00720     
00721     // output occupation probabilites
00722     for(unsigned int thread=0; thread<numberofthreads; thread++)
00723     {
00724         for(unsigned int j=0; j<occPOneRun[thread].size();j++) 
00725         {
00726             if(occPOneRun[thread][j] > 0)
00727             {
00728                 // cout << "[thread " << thread+1 << "] "<<"occupation probability " << node[j]->id+1 << ": " << occPOneRun[thread][j] << endl;
00729             }
00730         }
00731     }
00732     // output occupation probabilites
00733     cout << endl;
00734     for(unsigned int j=0; j<occP.size();j++) 
00735     {
00736         if(occP[j] > 0)
00737         {
00738             // cout << "occupation probability " << node[j]->id+1 << ": " << occP[j] << endl;
00739         }
00740     }
00741     
00742     // write occupation probabilites
00743     KMCMultiple::WriteOcc(occP, node);
00744     
00745     return true;
00746 }
00747 
00748 
00749 }}
00750 
00751 
00752 #endif  /* __VOTCA_KMC_MULTIPLE_H */
